## Description {#details}

The call site kernel info abstract attribute, basically, what can we say about a call site with regards to the <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-openmpopt-cpp-/kernelinfostate">KernelInfoState</a>.

For now this simply forwards the information from the callee.

Definition at line 4868 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/openmpopt-cpp">OpenMPOpt.cpp</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### handleParallel51() {#a1217110bea3dc6c47ed8fab732d092b9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;OpenMPOpt.cpp&#125;::AAKernelInfoCallSite::handleParallel51 (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> &amp; A, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp; CB)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Deal with a &#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;parallel&#95;51 call (<code>CB</code>).

Returns true if the call was handled, if a problem occurred, false is returned.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/openmpopt-cpp/#l05141">5141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/openmpopt-cpp">OpenMPOpt.cpp</a>.

### updateImpl() {#aa952da5010350f12b8d601516719d22b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ChangeStatus anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;OpenMPOpt.cpp&#125;::AAKernelInfoCallSite::updateImpl (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> &amp; A)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
The actual update/transfer function which has to be implemented by the derived classes.

If it is called, the environment has changed and we have to determine if the current information is still valid or adjust it otherwise.

\\Return CHANGED if the internal state changed, otherwise UNCHANGED.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/openmpopt-cpp/#l05050">5050</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/openmpopt-cpp">OpenMPOpt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
